summary: The module offers TensorFlow‑based implementations of Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) using the Deep Graph Library, including standard, message‑passing, and built‑in optimized versions, together with a training script that loads citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed), builds the model, runs training/evaluation loops, and reports node classification accuracy.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run reference implementation for researchers and developers to experiment with GCNs on benchmark citation datasets, facilitating rapid prototyping, performance comparison, and educational purposes in graph deep learning projects.
